name: Avorion - Soundtrack
detailed_description:
This is the official Soundtrack of Avorion in OGG format, containing 22 tracks of over 143 minutes total of ambient and electronic music.

Thanks to our amazing Composers Harnes Kretzer and Per Kiilstofte, who have been composing the music for Avorion! If you want to support the game and the artists who made the music, you should definitely consider getting the soundtrack!

01. Particle 04:00
02. Blinding Nebula 07:45
03. Exhale 04:02
04. Float 07:09
05. Happily Lost 07:16
06. Beyond 07:28
07. In Sight 05:52
08. Befog 04:43
09. Light Dance 06:24
10. Long Forgotten 06:54
11. Interim 11:26
12. Impact 11:57
13. Found 09:24
14. Behind Storms 08:04
15. Combat 0 05:08
16. Combat 1 05:14
17. Combat 2 05:02
18. Combat 3 05:06
19. Combat 4 05:11
20. A.I. 05:18
21. Boss Encounter 05:10
22. Guardian of Xsotan 05:08

You will find the soundtrack in the "dlc" folder of the game's steam installation folder.

To easily go there:
Right-Click Avorion in your Steam library -> Properties -> Local Files -> Browse Local Files...
